sections.heading: Alteration, Amendment or Extension of Charter by Incorporated Medical, Dental, Pharmaceutical, Etc
sections.text:
Section 10-1-1

Alteration, Amendment or Extension of Charter by Incorporated Medical, Dental, Pharmaceutical, Etc., Association.

All provisions of Title 10 have been repealed or transferred to Title 10A, effective January 1, 2011.

(Acts 1915, No. 155, p. 160; Code 1923, §§6983-6985; Code 1940, T. 10, §19.)

sections.heading: Establishment of Segregated, Separate Political Funds; Voluntary Contributions; Filing of Disclosure Reports; Violations.
sections.text:
Section 10-1-2

Establishment of Segregated, Separate Political Funds; Voluntary Contributions; Filing of Disclosure Reports; Violations.

All provisions of Title 10 have been repealed or transferred to Title 10A, effective January 1, 2011.

(Acts 1979, No. 79-705, p. 1253, §1.)

sections.heading: Alteration or Amendment of Charter by Corporations Not of Business Character; Filing and Contents of Declarations; Issuance of Certificate; Provisions Cumulative
sections.text:
Section 10-1-3

Alteration or Amendment of Charter by Corporations Not of Business Character; Filing and Contents of Declarations; Issuance of Certificate; Provisions Cumulative.

All provisions of Title 10 have been repealed or transferred to Title 10A, effective January 1, 2011.

(Acts 1980, No. 80-462, p. 722.)
